node.description: The trees crowd close, their thick rope-like roots making the ground uneven and breaking through the leaf litter in spots. Here and there, the roots frame murky holes leading down into the earth that look like open maws waiting to gobble an ill-placed foot.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Undulating rust-colored tendrils of sathmoor moss twist and tangle through tree roots and a copse of unfortunate mountain laurel that is being strangled by the parasitic vines. Clusters of the moss' grape-like seeds occasionally drop from the canopy far above, landing with a series of thudding sounds that could easily be mistaken for footfalls.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: The muddy ground squishes sickeningly underfoot and makes traveling through the area very slow going. Sodden earth and rotting vegetation form a sticky, spongy mat that is unwilling to easily release its hold.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Feather-leafed ferns cluster along the muddy edge of a shallow frog pool. Some broad cypress trees grow near the water, but few other trees do. The sparseness of trees in the pond creates a break in the canopy that allows a few stars to peek into view.

Feather-leafed ferns cluster near a muddy frog pool. Some broad cypress trees grow along the dirty edge of the water, their fluted bases connected to their reflections, but few other trees do. The sparseness of trees in the pond creates a break in the canopy that allows thin shafts of sunlight to filter down into this otherwise shaded place.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: To the south, a shallow pool sprawls beneath the forest canopy. Its calm surface looks like a sheet of black glass until a falling leaf or skittering insect disturbs the illusion and sends concentric circles rippling outward from their movement.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Deepening shadows created by the thick leafy canopy soaring overhead foster a sense of forboding where the seeds of fear may be found. Broad-leafed plants nourished on decaying vegetation creep along the forest floor seeking whatever dim light might reach them. The acrid smell of rot and fetid earth hangs heavily in the air.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: The dense forest seems thinner to the south, where breaks in the trees allow shimmering twinkles of silver starlight to rain down on the slumbering underbrush. Above, there is no such break in the canopy and the darkness of the leafy cover is blacker than the night sky could ever be.
The dense forest seems thinner to the south, where color and the golden warmth of sunlight seem to live without the deadening pall of eternal darkness that envelops the Paasvadh.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: The ground slopes down toward a swampy pool to the east and the spongy carpet of decaying mulch covering the forest floor is so soggy here that each step is a struggle. The towering trees nearby seem rooted in the black muck out of sheer unwillingness to fight against its sticky stubbornness.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: The ground here is sodden and squishes with each step, leaving small foot-shaped ponds of murky water. Pale lichen-patched stones rise like islands from a dark sea of wet leaves. A shallow pool of water to the south and east glistens faintly through the gloom.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: A fallen tree covered in tufted pillows of green and brown moss lays partially submerged in the dark waters of the shallow pond nearby. Nearly as tall as two Gor'Togs, its gangly root ball has been pulled out of the soft mud and cleaned of soil by years of rainfall.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Though too dark to see, a plentitude of insects is evidenced by the constant humming and buzzing that underlies the croaking of frogs. Other less recognizable sounds occasionally pierce the gloomy silence and echo through the wood.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: The oppressive pall of darkness in the understory weighs as heavily on one's soul as does the muck on one's feet. Travel is further slowed by tangles of sathmoor tendrils, fallen limbs and mud-clad stones that ambush the unwary. But the towering trees forming the forest canopy soar above it all and selfishly keep the open air of the broad night sky all to themselves.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Gossamer strands of an immense spider web stretch between the gnarled black branches of a dead sourwood tree half-buried in the mud. The fine lines of the perfectly formed web catch the faintest light and glisten with moisture rising from the wet ground. Now and again, the web twitches with the movements of its architect, a black orb weaver hidden by the darkness.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: The smell of death and decay undiluted by even the slightest breeze is chokingly strong. Each squishy step releases a fresh plume of miasma that hangs low in the air and attracts a cloud of insects.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: In the soggy landscape surrounding the forest pool, many species of frogs croak their gravelly songs from the darkness. There is a great range in their varied voices. Some have a deep, guttural tone and hold their note for a roisan or more, while others have a higher-pitched allegro song and still others carry the mid-range with a halting staccato.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Strange sounds filter down through the shadows from the treetops, often accompanied by a shower of twigs, leaves and nuts from a soaring peregan tree nearby. Judging from the profuse litter of cracked open nutshells on the ground, it is apparent that something strong in this forest enjoys their meat.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Filled with the ever-constant stench of rot, the unmoving air is humid and stifling. Every surface close to the ground is coated with heavy moss or fuzzy mold that releases nose-tickling spores. Iridescent slicks of slime reveal the paths of slugs across the smooth bark of a recently fallen ironwood limb.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Footprints captured in the muck from a recent passer-by slowly fill with muddy brown water and disappear. They are quite large and appear almost humanoid but have a finger-like toe extending from the heel. The tracks don't have a wide stride, but seem to belong to a heavy creature with a loping gait.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Sathmoor moss smothers the ground, feeding on the decaying mat of leaves and dead wood. To the south, a large mound covered with the moss' invasive tendrils resembles a flattened ball of twine the color of dried blood.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: The ancient forest seems to resonate with secrets gleaned from having witnessed many ages of men passing beneath. Shadows cling to everything, making the darkness blacker and further shrouding the understory in mystery.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Grease-clotted sticky black mud lies thickly on the stony ground and a dark mist hangs from the trees. Moisture drips sluggishly from unseen sources and everything feels cold and clammy to the touch.

node.name: Paasvadh Forest, Understory
node.description: Long knotted tendrils of grey-green maiden's tress moss hang from the unseen boughs above and fall gently to the ground where the dampness colors them a muddy brown. A circle of spindly white mushrooms pushes through the spongy mat of rotting leaves and seems too bright and clean to belong in the understory.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Outer Courtyard
node.description: Flickering lanterns flank a thin pathway which leads from the front gate to a large building. Shadows cast by the large boulders in the lawn dance upon the sere grass. Steeply pitched roofs on the buildings within the compound help ward off the elements during the harsher seasons.

The buildings within the compound have steeply pitched roofs that help ward off the elements during the harsher seasons. A broad expanse of sere grass which lies between the gate and large buildings is littered with rock and boulders.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Courtyard
node.description: A dusty gravel path leads to the center of the courtyard where a small dark statue of a raccoon stands. Hewn cedar benches encircle the area, providing a restful place for contemplation.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Foyer
node.description: Carved granite urns filled with leafy ferns flank a silverwood door. Octagonal tiles of silver-flecked black stone line the floor. The walls feature frescos that depict the same landscape during each of the four seasons.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Gathering Room
node.description: A large stone fireplace dominates one wall of the windowless room. A mismatched pair of shabby leather chairs huddles close to the hearth, while battered pine benches, with iron braziers placed beside them to warm chilled toes, provide extra seating. Tables topped with carved slabs of granite, each boasting a pewter candelabrum, are placed within easy reach of most of the seating.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Infirmary
node.description: Partitioned from the rest of the building by folding screens, the size of the infirmary can be changed as needed to accommodate patients. Shelves of supplies line the walls, while a battered worktable is shoved beneath a window. A stack of stained pallets near a cast iron stove bears silent testimony to the work which has been done here.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Altar
node.description: Worn smooth by the passage of time and countless feet, the floor is tiled with marble vela'tohr flowers set within black granite octagons. Ceiling beams are carved with a series of bloom-covered vines that twist between evenly spaced chandeliers. The curved walls of the rotunda are lavishly painted with a fresco that depicts a variety of animals. By comparison, the marble altar in the middle of the room seems plain.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Refectory
node.description: Polished copper pots and pans hang upon the wall on either side of a large stove. Candle sconces are affixed to the other walls, between cluttered shelves stacked with culinary equipment and supplies. A pair of large trestle tables fills most of the room, surrounded by threadbare runners lining the barely passable areas between the fixtures and the benches by the tables.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Mud Room
node.description: Wool hangings woven into geometric patterns cover the walls, creating a windbreak between the door and the rest of the guildhall. Dried flakes of mud cling to a brass bootjack shoved halfway underneath a silverwillow wicker chair. A wooden rack holds numerous pairs of footwear, most of which have been encrusted in various substances.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, West Courtyard
node.description: Torches gutter and flicker in sheltered spots, casting a pale light over large cisterns and a large building which blots out a portion of the southern night sky. A vine-covered wall enclosing the compound curves to the north and south and disappears into the darkness. A cast iron gate allows access into a smaller building, while a stout door leads into the main building.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Library
node.description: Freestanding shelves surround a large stone table in the center of the room. Thick velvet draperies almost completely hide the walls from view. At regular intervals wall sconces emerge from folds in the material, each bearing a softly glowing gaethzen orb.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Cloisters
node.description: Woven straw mats run the length of the hall, offering a measure of protection against the stone floor beneath. Multi-colored wool hangings work as a similar buffer for the walls. A brass telescope on a battered tripod points towards a large window.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Cloisters
node.description: Carved silverwillow beams run the length of the corridor, supporting the sloping ceiling. Suspended at regular intervals from the elevated end of the hallway, chandeliers illuminate the cloisters with candlelight. Laid end-to-end, woven straw mats speckled with drips of wax soften the stone floor underfoot.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Cloisters
node.description: Illuminated by candlelight from above, heavy wool tapestries are spaced evenly between numerous doorways. Straw mats line the floors throughout the corridor, providing a buffer between feet and the stone.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Cloisters
node.description: A fresco occupies one wall, its ashen hues illustrating somber scenes. The aroma of incense drifts up from a shallow copper bowl resting on a low table between two doors.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Cloisters
node.description: Rows of candles arranged on tall iron stands illuminate this end of the cloisters with a soft golden glow. Dryads carved into the exposed rafters peer down, as if scrutinizing all who come and go in their domain.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, East Courtyard
node.description: Thriving plants in large glazed pots threaten to overwhelm the dusty courtyard. Covered cisterns conceal most of a fortified wall. Pathways paved with octagonal flagstones meander through a potted garden, connecting an iron gate, the door to the main building, and a small cottage.

node.name: Clerics' Guild, Guildleader's Office
node.description: An aged silverwillow desk sits in the center of the room. Woven in shades of green and gold, a faded rug patterned with wheat sheaves stretches between the door and a pierced stone screen. Scroll-filled shelves take up most of the space near the walls, leaving barely any room for a window.

node.name: Pilgrimage Trail, The Vela'Tohr Feltery
node.description: Undyed wool rugs, woven in shades of russet and dull black, cover the floors. The walls are cloaked with felted draperies of light brown adorned with bands of black kidskin embroidered with pale grey in a neat geometric pattern. In the center of the shop, a cedar table covered with merchandise sits between two racks. Shelves flank a stout door leading to the outside.

node.name: Pilgrimage Trail, The Vela'Tohr Feltery
node.description: The warm glow of oil lamps reveals a spacious hall. Looms take up the central portion of the space, comfortable padded benches pulled up at each one. Along the walls, cedar shelves are filled with orderly rows of baskets overflowing with balls of yarn. Sacks of carded wool, ready to be spun, sit between a pair of spinning wheels positioned next to the dark windows.

Woven mats of sweet grass cover the floor of the spacious hall. Looms take up the central portion of the space, comfortable padded benches pulled up at each one. Along the walls, cedar shelves are filled with orderly rows of baskets overflowing with balls of yarn in hues of grey, cream and sable. Sacks of carded wool, ready to be spun, sit between a pair of spinning wheels positioned next to the large windows facing north.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: A gate constructed from mismatched planks of wood is firmly wedged shut where two stone walls bordering the field converge. The walls are pocked with deep gouges and blackened with streaks of soot. Remnants of burnt vegetation crunch underfoot, although hints of green skirt the scorched tract to the north and west.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Stunted and withered stalks of wheat are strangled by thick greenish-brown vines armed with cruel thorns. Running parallel to the weathered stone wall at the edge of the field, a broad swathe of bare, scorched earth cuts across the untended rows. The scent of smoke lingers unpleasantly in the night air.

Stunted and withered stalks of wheat are strangled by thick greenish-brown vines armed with cruel thorns. Running parallel to the weathered stone wall at the edge of the field, a broad swathe of bare, scorched earth cuts across the untended rows. The scent of smoke lingers unpleasantly, and only a few tracks of small animals give evidence that there are still regular visitors to the area.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Untidy sheaves of wheat, out of reach of the meager protection offered by the stone wall, lean against one another while weeds spring up around their bases. A narrow strip of packed earth runs between the tangle of thorny vines and the wall. Thready runners stretch across the bare ground, greedily reaching for the untouched greenery.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Curving west, the rock wall separates what's left of the field from the road and the edge of the forest. Beneath a reddish-brown stain on the wall, a steel-bladed scythe lies forgotten and rusting in the grasp of the greenery. Only patches of packed and scorched earth are bare of the omnipresent vines.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Withered amethyst bloom vines hang limply against the stone wall, nearly engulfed by the rapacious thorny green vines. Stretching toward the sky, a few hardy weeds stubbornly struggle to survive the engulfing tangle of vines. Over the wall, the shadowy silhouette of Asketi's Mount blots out a large portion of the night sky.

Withered amethyst bloom vines hang limply against the stone wall, nearly engulfed by the rapacious thorny green vines. Stretching toward the sky, a few hardy weeds stubbornly struggle to survive the engulfing tangle of vines. Over the wall, a dense forest stretches northwards, blanketing part of the slope of Asketi's Mount.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Withered amethyst bloom vines hang limply against the stone wall, nearly engulfed by the rapacious thorny green vines. Stretching toward the sky, a few hardy weeds stubbornly struggle to survive the engulfing tangle of vines. Over the wall, the shadowy silhouette of Asketi's Mount blots out a large portion of the night sky.

Withered amethyst bloom vines hang limply against the stone wall, nearly engulfed by the rapacious thorny green vines. Stretching toward the sky, a few hardy weeds stubbornly struggle to survive the engulfing tangle of vines. Over the wall, a dense forest stretches northwards, blanketing part of the slope of Asketi's Mount.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Bled dry of life and color, a sickly silverwillow tree glimpsed over the crumbling wall is pierced by the red thorns of the thick green vines coiled about it. The weight of the vines is slowly pulling the tree down. More vines spill from over the wall into the field, and no sign of the original crops remains.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Stunted and withered stalks of wheat are strangled by thick greenish-brown vines armed with cruel thorns. Running parallel to the weathered stone wall at the edge of the field, a broad swathe of bare, scorched earth cuts across the untended rows. The scent of smoke lingers unpleasantly in the night air.

Stunted and withered stalks of wheat are strangled by thick greenish-brown vines armed with cruel thorns. Running parallel to the weathered stone wall at the edge of the field, a broad swathe of bare, scorched earth cuts across the untended rows. The scent of smoke lingers unpleasantly, and only a few tracks of small animals give evidence that there are still regular visitors to the area.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Stunted and withered stalks of wheat are strangled by thick greenish-brown vines armed with cruel thorns. Running parallel to the weathered stone wall at the edge of the field, a broad swathe of bare, scorched earth cuts across the untended rows. The scent of smoke lingers unpleasantly in the night air.

Stunted and withered stalks of wheat are strangled by thick greenish-brown vines armed with cruel thorns. Running parallel to the weathered stone wall at the edge of the field, a broad swathe of bare, scorched earth cuts across the untended rows. The scent of smoke lingers unpleasantly, and only a few tracks of small animals give evidence that there are still regular visitors to the area.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Curling away from the scorched strip of land to the south, the thorny vines form a tangled mat overwhelming the scattered clumps of withered wheat pushing up through the invasive vegetation. Crops already engulfed slowly rot into mulch, fertilizing the vines and adding their aroma to the ashy scent hanging over the field.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Curling away from the scorched strip of land to the south, the thorny vines form a tangled mat overwhelming the scattered clumps of withered wheat pushing up through the invasive vegetation. Crops already engulfed slowly rot into mulch, fertilizing the vines and adding their aroma to the ashy scent hanging over the field.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Outskirts, An Abandoned Field
node.description: Several forlorn stalks of wheat still stand, seemingly huddled against the wall for protection against the voracious vines blanketing the rest of the field. Occasionally something rustles through the greenery, causing the vines to seem to move with a life of their own.

Several forlorn stalks of wheat still stand, seemingly huddled against the wall for protection against the voracious vines blanketing the rest of the field. Crows perch on the weathered rock, eyeing the abandoned bounty. Occasionally something rustles through the greenery, causing the vines to seem to move with a life of their own.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: A malevolent garden borne of secrets unknown to mortals, the forest's edge is inviting to the adventurous of spirit, yet foreboding to the strong of mind. Dark red-tinged creeper vines drape across skeletal claw-like trees, evoking the image of poisonous adders writhing in the sky above.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: The audible trickling of water beckons seductively from its unseen source. A twisted myriad of dark vines stretch from the treetops above, blocking out all light -- whether by sun or star. It is a wonder that anything grows on the forest's floor at all.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: Thin veils of black widow's lace grass drape over the soft soil, silencing every step as if it were enfolded in its own void. The foliage seems to stir constantly when glimpsed peripherally, yet no movement can be discerned in the immediate surroundings.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: A severely knotted witchclaw tree rises in the center of the path, its barren branches entangled in pale silver amethyst vines blooming with vibrant violet blossoms. The scene is a stark contrast of despair and beauty, one that is prevalent in this mysterious forest.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: Soft patches of black lichen show up sparsely on the soil, intertwined with widow's lace and dark green moss. Trees of all shapes, sizes and colors writhe up from the soil in all directions. Woven amidst the branches of every tree are dark green vines tinged with a crimson gleam, a curious sign of foreboding to the experienced tracker.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: Tangled masses of dark green vines dangle down from their perches, interwoven into the treetop canopy far above the forest floor. The rustling of leaves is audible in the distance, yet the presence of wildlife seems strangely absent.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: A teetering wild plum tree flanks the path, burdened by a shawl of the omnipresent green vines tinged with red highlights. The thorns of each vine dig and pierce into the wounded tree's fleshy bark, as if feasting upon fallen prey.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: The pungent aroma of jasmine perfumes the air, although no blossoms are visible. Silvery strands of a tangled widow's web stretch between the branches of a stunted witchclaw tree, adorning it like a fine-jeweled platinum glove.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: A single tree lies toppled in the pathway, covered with a carpet of red-thorned dark green vines. With sporadic movements, the vines twitch and twist over the withering ironwood husk, as if sapping it of its very life.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: Giant ferns sweep out into the pathway here, brushing passersby with their feathery fronds. The distant sounds of trickling water cascades through the air, beckoning from the depths of the mysterious wood.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: A massive black willow looms the height of twenty Gor'Togs or more, casting a pall of shade over the silent forest floor. The sheer number and variety of shrubs, trees, and vines basking beneath it is startling, as if this lush forest was host to every variety of plant known to mortals -- and surely some that have yet to be discovered.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: A pool of gleaming silvery water yawns open in the earth, its surface glassy and serene. Blooming amethyst vines emerge from its depths to coil up the side of a nearby yew tree. The darker crimson-tinted vines seem to shy away from the pool, rejecting the nourishment it supplies.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: A curtain of undulating maiden's tresses is visible high in the treetops above, twitching about in search of warm flesh to devour in its deadly embrace. All is quiet save for the rustling of the tress vines, as if the forest denizens avoid this area and the bizarre plant's seductive, predatory dance. For now, it remains at its perch, granting passage to those who are swift.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: Silvery dew trickles off of the dark green vines dangling from the verdant patchwork sky, forming small pools of glassy crystal that echo their muted cries of disruption at each intermittent drop.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: A velvety carpet of flora explodes suddenly into being in this spot, bearing vibrant flowers and plants of all colors and shapes. A sense of exuberance permeates the air here, as if it were charged with the essence of Life itself.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: A single tree lies rotting and shattered amidst a colony of its healthier brethren. The omnipresent thorny red-tinted vines are curiously absent around it, although what is left of its bark has been scarred horribly with gouge marks.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: The sound of water dripping in the distance echoes quietly, steadily keeping the pulse of the forest. The rhythm is fragile yet determined, as if the slightest tilt could shatter its equilibrium and end the balance of life in this oddly beautiful place.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: Desiccated amethyst vines hang limp off the side of a nearby tree, their delicate forms crushed and dominated by the thicker green vines armed with thorny red barbs. The cycle of life in this habitat becomes clearer, and it is certain that all is not as it may appear.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: Tufts of dry, scraggly witchgrass nestle at the base of a nearby tree to garner shelter and shade. This particular tree looks rather sickly, as if stricken with something that its neighbors have not yet caught.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Edge, Adder's Coil
node.description: The surroundings grow dimmer, the flora itself seeming more monotone than at the entrance to this bizarre garden. Moving into the heart of the wood, everything seems to shift from vibrant, explosive colors into chalky, dull greys.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: A soft buzzing sound emanates from a hollow beneath one of the silverwillows crowding the banks of a small stream. Grass grows throughout, thinning and losing color as it approaches the waterline. A narrow trail leads southerly towards a healthier region of the forest.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Stunted trees press in from all sides, grabbing at hair and clothing. Tatters of grey moss caught in the branches flutter like shrouds snatched from the restless dead. In curious contrast to the distorted trees, a lush carpet of black widow's lace grass provides a gloriously dark setting for colorful mounds of flowering adder's tongue.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Crone's hair moss hangs in clumps from the barren, twisted limbs of a massive oak. Gnarled roots reach out in all directions from the base of the hulking tree to trip the unwary. From somewhere nearby comes the muted sound of running water.

Pallid streaks of daylight pierce the canopy to cast dappled shadows on the ground. Crone's hair moss hangs in clumps from the barren, twisted limbs of a massive oak. Gnarled roots reach out in all directions from the base of the hulking tree to trip the unwary. From somewhere nearby comes the muted sound of running water.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: The limbs of elder trees interweave overhead, blocking out any glimpse of the sky. Somehow, a thick undergrowth of creeping vines and pale ferns thrive in the perpetual dusk, threatening to block the path at every turn. Pale wisps of mists drift like aimless wraiths through the tangle of vines and trees.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Thorned vines slither up and around the ancient oak trees like fanged vipers. Broken, rotting limbs lay scattered over the ground like gangrenous appendages. Standing out in the drear wood, red-capped mushrooms push up through the carpet of decomposing leaves, thriving in the moist decay.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Festooned with ropy grey blankets of moss, the gnarled limbs of an enormous oak stretch overhead. Deep gouges, the width of a finger or more, mar the bark of the forest giant. The edges of the gouges are weathered, proving the damage occurred some time ago, yet the tree still weeps viscous dribbles of sap.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: A huge oak tree dominates the center of the clearing, lifting its great branches up to the sky. Crone's hair moss hangs in clumps from the barren limbs while gnarled roots snake out in all directions to trip the unwary.

A huge oak tree dominates the center of the clearing, lifting its great branches up to the sky. Crone's hair moss hangs in clumps from the barren limbs while gnarled roots snake out in all directions to trip the unwary. Wan light filters down to cast dappled shadows on the ground.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Barely audible, the trickling of water whispers seductively from its unseen source. Lush green vines armed with red thorns smother the eastern flank of the massive oak tree, yielding grudgingly to the grey moss swaying from the leafless limbs. Rocky soils shows dark amidst scraggly patches of thin grass.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Cloyingly thick, the omnipresent stench of the stream permeates the area with a sickening miasma. Icy fingers of mist slither around once prospering trees, as if groping blindly for victims to choke. Dim reflections float on the dark waters, shattering and reforming with the slow moving current.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Hollow with distance, throaty ululations worry at the edge of hearing and then vanish. The gnarled and diseased limbs of oak trees are being slowly strangled by black-thorned vines covered with blooms resembling purple spiders. A small patch of weeds clusters around a large rock jutting from the ground.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Skeletal tree limbs stretch imploringly up to the sky, withered leaves clinging tenaciously despite strong mountain winds. A roiling mist clings to the surface of the stream coursing through the oaks and silverwillows. The slick rocks bordering the stream are streaked with strangely luminescent lichen.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Chill tendrils of mist rise from a malodorous stream coursing through the tangle. The yellowish fog eddies eerily around the tree trunks, swirling in response to shifts in the air currents and movement of any living thing. The bare limbs of sickly silverwillow trees stretch across the path, as if poised to scratch or ensnare the unwary.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Sickly yellow-green scum covers the surface of a small pool. Skeletal trees, bereft of leaves and life, lean precariously over the water like drunkards about to fall into a gutter. The blight is especially virulent here, coating the ground and trees with a thick, oozing fungus reeking of rot.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Thin veils of mist chill the air. Riddled with splotches of fungus, the scaly black trunks of pine trees rise up all around. Overhead, thick branches lock together and support a tangled mat of moss and vines. Brown needles cover the ground, hiding tripping hazards like protruding roots and treacherous stones.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: A ridge heaves up sharply from the forest floor, a long rise of stone and earth curved like a claw. Trees cling to its flanks, their leafy canopies shrouding the world in darkness. Smelling of crisp pine and the less pleasant scent of decay, pale mists rise from the black earth and curl through the scatter of rocks and trees.

A ridge heaves up sharply from the forest floor, a long rise of stone and earth curved like a claw. Trees cling to its flanks, their leafy canopies shrouding the world in grey twilight. Smelling of crisp pine and the less pleasant scent of decay, pale mists rise from the black earth and curl through the scatter of rocks and trees.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: A vast tangle of root and limbs, the wood is painted in shades of chalky grey splashed with splotches of reddish black where fungus oozes over the blighted trees. Drifting up from the ground, yellowish mist thickens and thins inexplicably while carrying the scents of damp and decay.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Icy fingers of water trickle down the sheer cliff and form a fetid rivulet that wends its way sluggishly south. Chill winds tear at the brittle branches of dying silverwillows huddling close to the slow moving water. Rotting leaves and branches form a loose tangle of debris in the rivulet, caught on stones slick with slimy black moss.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Writhing like snakes, wisps of yellowish mist drift up off a rivulet to the east. Half sunk in the soft boggy soil, storm-shattered trees lay strewn across the clearing whether broken by wind or ice is hard to say. Rotting stumps, covered with thick shelves of scabrous fungus, rear out of the deadfall.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: What light filters through the dense canopy scarcely penetrates the gloomy shadows beneath the trees. The trunks of the towering trees are splotched with some type of sickly fungus. Reeking of death and decay, the forest floor is carpeted with dismal grey-green leaves on top and black rot underneath.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Spidery vines smother the sloping ground, tangling about the trunks of browning pines. Murky light barely penetrates the layers of leaves and boughs. A whispering rustle accompanies the slightest disturbance in the air. The air is ripe with the scent of damp earth and faint corruption.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Skeletons of once-thriving trees crowd together, their gnarled limbs sculpted by the harsh mountain winds. Tangles of thorny red-tinted vines snake around the trunks and drape the chalky grey trees with a vibrant explosion of color.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Grey and lifeless, a pervasive air of decay hangs over this region of the woods. A number of trees lean precariously against one another, worn beyond endurance by the blight. Limbs shattered, one pine has succumbed utterly and crashed to the forest floor. A sickly growth of fungus has sprung up along its scaly bark.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: Draped with tattered grey moss, the barren trees resemble skeletal black arms clad in the rotting remnants of winding sheets. Reaching through the icy fog shrouding the forest, the dense tangle of vegetation forms an impenetrable barrier blocking passage at nearly every turn.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: To the north, the immense mass of the mountain emerges from pale wisps of mist. Icy fingers of water trickle down from the snowpack above into small pools. Blighted trees huddle close together as if commiserating with one another over their plight. Occasional blasts of frigid air set limbs clattering against one another, raining desiccated leaves down to the forest floor.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Blighted Tangle
node.description: A narrow track ends abruptly where a massive shoulder of black granite juts from the side of the mountain. Part of the cliff has collapsed, leaving a great jumble of fallen rock that partially blocks a dark cave mouth. A thick blanket of yellow-green lichen spreads over much of the area, aglow with a dim patches of phosphorescent light.

A narrow track ends abruptly where a massive shoulder of black granite juts from the side of the mountain. Part of the cliff has collapsed, leaving a great jumble of fallen rock that partially blocks a dark cave mouth. Sheltered from the sun's cruel light by the stony slopes, a thick blanket of yellow-green lichen spreads over much of the area.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Canopied Trail
node.description: Towering ironwoods spread their canopies over the stunted oaks and scrubby pines, the sparsely leafed limbs interlacing in a web of rot-riddled wood that hangs low over the narrow ridge rising up from the forest floor. A few of the lower branches of the trees are broken, as if something large had passed this way recently.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Cave Mouth
node.description: The cave mouth opens into a broad interior passage that extends out of sight in the darkness to the north. Slow drops of water fall from the ceiling, striking the floor with a splat that echoes off the rock walls. A low, breathy chittering accompanies the rustling of leathery wings overhead. Underfoot, bat guano covers the floor and holds the tracks of some large, bipedal creature.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: A shifting flock of large bats blankets the cavern's ceiling. Occasionally, one of the creatures flexes its wings with a papery rustle. Other, less readily identifiable sounds tease along the edge of hearing, distorted by the echoing tunnels.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Illuminating patches of lichen cling to the walls, giving off a pallid phosphorescent glow. A soft scratching sound can be heard coming from somewhere nearby, although between the echo of dripping water and the dim surroundings, the source cannot be easily pinpointed.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Although lost to sight in the darkness shrouding the ceiling, the scratching of claws on rock and the quiet squeaks of bats can be clearly heard. Every visible surface of tunnel is streaked with guano that fills the air with an acrid odor.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Signs point to something or someone bent on improving upon nature's design, transforming these subterranean tunnels from an uninhabited warren into a permanent lair. Crooked timbers reinforce stone walls and some attempt has been made to level the floor. A ragged hide flap covers an opening in the north wall.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: A vile combination of wood smoke, unwashed bodies, rotting garbage and bat guano fills the area with a stomach-churning aroma. The air itself has an oily feel, leaving a film on the skin and clothing of anyone attempting to pick their way through the piles that obstruct the burrow.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: The tunnel narrows here, sloping sharply upwards to the north. A thick layer of dust and guano coats the passage floor. Tiny, glowing red eyes peer down from the cavern's ceiling, and a dry rustling fills the air like autumn leaves stirred by wind.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Narrowing significantly, the dark stone enclosing the tunnel seems to press inwards, and a whisper of chill air swirls through the area from above. The high-pitched chittering of bats fills the tunnel, yet every so often the noise ceases abruptly for several heartbeats before resuming.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: The tunnel slopes down to the south, gradually curving out of sight. Trickles of icy water seep from the rock walls, collecting in thin rivulets that spill down the floor of the steeply slanted passage. A broken spear shaft lies amidst a scattering of well-gnawed bones. Faint scratching and rustling noises echo up the tunnel from below.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: The geometrically precise tunnel forms a straight, if somewhat steep, passage through dark granite walls. Scrapes mar the stone and disturb the dust lying thick on the floor, as if something large and heavy has been dragged this way.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: The rough texture of the stone walls is further marred by gouges and scorch marks. Splintered bones and broken axes give mute testimony to a battle here in the past. Chipped columns support a lintel over an elaborately carved granite door. Set heart-high on a tall Elf, a glowing crystal embedded in the door bathes the area with an eldritch light.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: The rough granite walls of the cavern stretch into darkness. The faint tang of guano is carried on a draft from some deeper part of the passage. A crude rope braided from vines tacitly invites exploration of the area above.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Various stone and steel mining equipment lies scattered around the room, bearing the dents and scars of frequent use. Well-braced crossbeams are spaced out along this section of the tunnel, occasionally creaking in reminder of the tremendous weight they are supporting. A ragged hide flap covers an opening in the south wall.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: The walls in this part of the cave are decorated with crude patterns. Although primitive in design, the patterns are intricately painted in streaks of ash-black and rusty brown. Bones have been attached to the walls, but the effect seems more decorative than structural. Polished to a gleaming white, the bones glitter in the dim light of the banked fire in the center of the cavern.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Pile upon pile of poorly tanned hides cover the ground, making it nearly impossible to move about without finding some sort of skin underfoot. In the center of the cave, an unscraped goatskin is stretched tautly over a makeshift frame.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Thin trickles of water creep down the walls, feeding the pool that fills most of this cavern. The oily surface gleams faintly in the subdued glow of the reflected firelight from the south. Despite the noxious odor of the water, the multitude of tracks on the muddy floor indicates that the pool is a popular place with the denizens of the tunnels.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Signs of intelligent life are apparent in the tunnels. The ceiling of this roughly worked passage is more even, the cave floor more regular, than any natural fissure. Long, sweeping femurs and radii reinforce the walls, cemented into place to give the impression of some gargantuan serpent's rib cage viewed from within. A faint whiff of smoke drifts past, carrying the promise of heat to drive away the mountain's pervasive chill from weary limbs.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Compared to the rest of the living quarters, this area is neatly arranged. A small pile of hay rests against one wall, and a pallet of furs is pushed up against the other. Between the two sits a flat boulder covered with small bundles of twigs and a piece of flint.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Mounds of hides fill the modest sized cavern, each apparently a separate sleeping space. The lumpy piles are all empty, with no sign of their residents' current whereabouts. Crude boxes clutter the area, providing a modicum of storage.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Chisel marks score the rock where ceiling and walls have been altered to enlarge the tunnel for easier passage. Clumps of luminescent lichen illuminate the dark stone, causing flecks of mica to glint erratically like spirits trying to manifest just beneath the surface of the granite.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Spidery cracks run across the walls, and one of the larger fissures sports a small colony of moss. The dust on the floor shows scuffed trails between a rickety ladder and the tunnel stretching to the northeast. Anchored by a large boulder, a rope braided from vines leads down into the pit dominating the center of the room.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Slow drops of water leak from the ceiling and strike the floor with soft splats that echo through the tunnel. Luminescent lichen flourishes in the damp environment, splotching the wall with dimly glowing streaks of blue-green. Tiny mushrooms poke up from the moss alongside the wall. The top of a ladder rests against the ledge, secured to the rock with rusted iron spikes.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Sloping downward to the east, a narrow ledge runs along the wall. Beneath it, a sheer drop-off plunges dizzyingly into darkness, offering no purchase to climb down into the depths. Some steps have been crudely cut into the side of the cliff face above, rising in a series of narrow switchbacks.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Carved from the solid bedrock, a switchback of granite stairs zigzags up the northern wall while more steps cut into the cliff face lead down to the space below. The wide ledge offers access to caves to the east and southwest. Clusters of wickedly curved fangs decorated with black beads hang from the tops of poles leaning against the cavern walls along the ledge.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Swirls and scuffs in the dust on the floor testify to vigorous action by large feet. Deep gouges inflicted by heavy objects wielded with unimaginable strength scar the walls of what can only be a training ground. Riddled with broken arrows, a target dummy is wedged into a tight corner.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Wedged into the corners of the room, crude wooden bins hold withered carrots and moldy onions, wrinkled potatoes oozing reddish-brown liquid, and weevil-filled bags of coarsely ground flour. Animal carcasses are slung from rusty hooks embedded in the ceiling. The floor is sticky underfoot, though it's hard to tell in the dim light whether spilled food or blood is the cause. Low benches surround a long granite block that serves as a table. Some sort of brownish crust speckles the top of the rough stone.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Worn smooth over time, granite stairs lead down into the lower caverns. A fraying rope ladder hangs against the wall, leading into the darkness overhead. The corners of the cavern are filled with discarded rubbish.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Damp walls close in tightly, thin rivulets of water trickling and dripping into puddles on the stone floor. The rough granite has been partially smoothed into angular planes of chiseled rock. A flickering torch dimly illuminates the tunnel and provides evidence that this area is regularly traveled.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Patches of lichen cling to the walls, giving off a pallid phosphorescent glow. Deep gouges mar the surface of the rough stone where something made a futile attempt to extend this underground burrow. Pile upon pile of ratty goatskins and straw cover the ground, making it nearly impossible to move about without finding some sort of makeshift bedding underfoot.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Various crude fletching tools and supplies lie scattered around the area, showing signs of frequent use. Unstrung longbows are racked on the weapons stands lining the cavern walls. Wood shavings and bone chips litter the floor around benches drawn up around the firepit in the center of the cavern.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Moisture seeps through cracks in the tunnel's roof, filling the air with dampness and the sound of dripping water. A rope ladder, lashed securely to a large outcropping, leads down into the lower tunnels. Though frayed, it appears sturdy enough to allow more climbers to pass along its length.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Damp walls close in tightly, thin rivulets of water trickling and dripping into puddles on the stone floor. The rough granite has been partially smoothed into angular planes of chiseled rock. A flickering torch dimly illuminates the tunnel and provides evidence that this area is regularly traveled.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: A single boulder, too large to lift or move, sits in the exact center of the cave. Scraps of food litter the uneven floor between piles of makeshift straw bedding. The low rocky ceiling and cramped quarters leave little room to move around.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Mounds of straw are arranged haphazardly around this dank cave, heaped with crudely tanned furs to form warm, if somewhat smelly, beds. Moldering piles of refuse, tossed aside by now absent inhabitants, collect in the corners. The visible portions of the stone floor are streaked with ash, leftovers from past fires and attempts at fires.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Poorly tanned hides have been stretched over tall wooden poles to form a windbreak around a jagged fissure. Dry flakes of snow swirl into the tunnel with each gust of wind. Footprints on the dusty stone floor bear mute witness to others who have passed this way. The passage narrows slightly as it inclines steeply downward, away from the fissure.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Overhang
node.description: Dead timber, perhaps stacked by previous hunters, is encased in ice and creates a snowy fence. Strategically placed in relation to the steady wind currents, it provides a formidable barricade on the western edge of the overlook.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Vela'Tohr Overlook
node.description: The cold wind screams relentlessly, sending pebbled shards and icy gravel skittering across the frozen ground. Powerful gusts cause even the strongest of hunters to sway precariously -- a false step would result in a very long fall.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Vela'Tohr Overlook
node.description: Frigid winds caress the area with icy fingertips, leaving traces of rimy fingerprints upon the hard rock. Icy pebbles and small stones litter the frozen ground like shattered pieces of cut glass.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Vela'Tohr Overlook
node.description: A massive rockslide hinders easy travel to the north, partially sheltering the area from the bitterly cold winds. The ground has been cleared of rubble and a few flat boulders are scattered randomly in small groupings.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Vela'Tohr Overlook
node.description: Light dustings of snow swirl upwards in odd shapes as tiny eddies sporadically shift and spin the white particles in all directions. Occasionally, several of these unusual shapes group together and sprint across the frozen ground like deformed rabbits fleeing from an angry beast.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Vela'Tohr Overlook
node.description: Shattered pieces of granite, finely dusted with tiny flecks of crystal, are strewn along the ground and encased in thin films of ice. Occasionally, additional pieces careen down the mountainside, skittering to an abrupt halt to lie amidst the rocky debris that has accumulated.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Vela'Tohr Overlook
node.description: A set of rusted crampons with rotting leather straps is half buried beneath a large ice-covered granite boulder surrounded by oddly shaped clumps of snow. Packed with particles of granite and frozen twigs, the wind has molded the hard-packed snow into sculptured creatures -- malformed and strangely menacing.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Vela'Tohr Overlook
node.description: Narrow shelves and dark fissures riddle the jagged cliffs looming above, offering temporary relief for those who dare the ascent of the towering mountain. Although the stone rises sheer here and offers no holds, an icy crevice that has opened in the mountain wall invites any would-be climbers to explore. Strong winds buffet even the most tenacious traveler, threatening to remove all in its path in order to restore the sterile beauty of frozen stone.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Vela'Tohr Overlook
node.description: Deep gouges formed by wind and ice mar the hard granite of the mountainside. Rivulets of water that have dribbled down from these small crevices are forever frozen, forming strangely shaped ice sculptures upon the sleek rock.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Vela'Tohr Overlook
node.description: Cold air sinks from above, chilling the bare stone underfoot. Nature's hand has carved a vast plateau from the cliffs that overlook the Vela'Tohr Woods. The night sky and mountain's shadows conspire to obscure the source of a muffled clattering punctuated with sharp pops and snaps.

Glimmers of blue-white frost soften the stark lines of the bare stone underfoot. Nature's hand has carved a vast plateau from the cliffs that overlook the Vela'Tohr Woods. Directly below, twisted skeletal trees huddle against the granite crags as if seeking protection from the icy winds that whistle down from the passes. The Woods spread south and west, growing noticeably lusher further away from the mountain. Far in the distance, the Liirewsag River can be seen winding its way towards Sawstwar Lake.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Overlook, Cliff's Edge
node.description: A thin layer of frost streaks the cliffside, creating a somewhat more treacherous climb on the rocky slope leading downwards. The wind howls forlornly, lovingly embracing courageous climbers in an icy grasp as it fills the air with eerie laments.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Cliff Base
node.description: A massive rockslide comprised of broken boulders and ice-covered granite rock ends abruptly against the mountainside. Looming above is a completely vertical, unscalable cliff, its sides coated with solid ice. Enclosed on three sides, this small area is sheltered from the omnipresent wind scouring the rest of the mountain.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Overlook, Rocky Cliff
node.description: Horizontal cracks rive the rock face below, offering scant finger- and toeholds. The slope rising above this small ledge angles inward for a slightly easier climb. Crumbling stone and small pebbles trickle down the cliff, careening and echoing noisily as they make their rapid descent. The temperature begins to drop considerably in the higher altitude.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Overlook, Precarious Shelf
node.description: Scraggly clumps of sirese flowers, partially protected by the rising cliff, grow bravely amidst the accumulation of rubble scattered haphazardly on the hard ground. Horizontal cracks striate the cliff -- strange handprints left by nature along the coarse stone wall.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Overlook, Precarious Shelf
node.description: A crumbling path arises from the foothills below, opening onto a rather large rocky shelf. Pieces of charred wood sitting within a circle of rocks give testament to previous hikers' campfires.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Rocky Cliff
node.description: A steep switchback trail from the foothills below ends abruptly on a small plateau. Dead brush and thorny bushes partially obscure a crumbling path that continues the ascent up the mountainside. The rocky ground is swept clean of the usual fallen debris by the strong gusts of wind whipping around the cliff edge. No leaves or twigs crunch underfoot and the lack of scent normally associated with growing vegetation leaves the area feeling curiously sterile.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Withered Foothills
node.description: Partially obscured by the rock and crushed stone is the beginning of a steep switchback trail ascending upwards. High overhead, rocky shelves and occasional overhangs mar the treacherous sides of the looming cliff that rises skyward.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Withered Foothills
node.description: Small rugged pebbles and sharp rock splinters scatter the area, runoff from the majestic mountain towering above. Random spots of green -- vegetation battling with the debris it's buried in -- offer muted color amidst the drab shards.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Withered Foothills
node.description: A lone vela'tohr plant grows stoically amidst hard packed ground comprised of small pebbles and stone, tiny remnants from the mountain that looms above it. It stands, a vigilant sentinel, before a rough trail that leads back to a denser part of the woods.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Withered Foothills
node.description: The distant sound of falling rocks echoes faintly from above where something makes it way along the heights. Amidst this desolation of skeletal trees and barren crags, a rough trail leads up the mountain, vanishing into the dark.

Amidst this desolation of skeletal trees and barren crags, Asketi's Mount dominates the view as it thrusts skyward. When the wind blows from the north, long plumes of snow fly from the high peak like banners. A rough trail disappears beyond a switchback upslope from here.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Withered Foothills
node.description: Clinging precariously to the stony ground, scrub pines sway and rustle in time with the fickle wind. Pebbles shift alarmingly underfoot and a few skitter over the edge of the ridge, a perilous reminder of rockslides. Stubborn ice glints dully from the shadowed clefts in the granite cliffs.

With the ridge dropping sharply towards the forest below, the narrow track hugs the mountain looming to the north. Tenacious scrub pines cling to the stony ground, growing in defiance of strong winds and occasional rockslides. Stubborn ice fills shadowed clefts in the granite cliffs.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Withered Foothills
node.description: Curiously washed-out hues paint the landscape in stark and pallid detail. Grass bleached to straw barely binds the soil together in the face of eroding winds and ice melt. The trees growing on either side of the rutted track are stunted and spindly, roots exposed where exhausted earth has crumbled beneath the onslaught of the elements.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Withered Foothills
node.description: A stand of blanched and bare birch struggles to survive in the stony ground as the path climbs up the sparsely wooded rise. The air lacks the rich scents of earth, loam and decay while underfoot the land is sere, showing evidence of a blight terrible enough to bleed the very life from the land.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Withered Foothills
node.description: Bent and twisted by strong mountain winds, an ambitious copse of witchclaw trees struggles along the sloping rise. Huddled in solitude at the edge of the ridge overlooking the tangle, a scraggly pine draped with veils of crone's hair moss broods over its reflection in a dark pool.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Box Canyon
node.description: Gutted from the mountain by wind and ice, the granite walls of the canyon pinch inward overhead to create scant shelter from the elements. Powdery grey moss dapples the lower surfaces and the ground is carpeted with wind-blown dirt and leaves. Chilly gusts whistle through the narrow opening to the south, carrying a faint scent of pine sap. To the north, the cleft narrows further to form a tunnel leading deeper into the mountain.

node.name: Vela'Tohr Woods, Dark Burrows
node.description: Dim light filters in through the opening. The granite walls look different here, shifting from shades of black to light greys and blues. The colors resolve into a faded mural emblazoned across the surface. Though difficult to encompass with a casual glance, the image shows two groups: one is near the tunnel opening while the other is much farther away. A two-headed adder separates the groups.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Glacial Precipice
node.description: Rocks and boulders slick with hoarfrost have made their home on a small shelf and partially obscure an icy crevice that leads to the overlook below. Scant, unidentifiable vegetation -- blighted leaves entombed in a frosty glaze -- huddle against the leeward side of some of the larger boulders.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Glacial Precipice
node.description: Piercing winds have carved out a small sheltered area where remnants from previous travelers are scattered carelessly among the rock shards and sharp pebbles. Shattered ice axes, rusted pitons, and broken crampons comprise most of the abandoned refuse discarded in disorganized ice-covered heaps.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Glacial Precipice
node.description: Overhead is a small icy ledge with frost-covered outcroppings and jagged edges. Long icicles encrusted with dirt and pebbles grimly hang from its outer rim like the cuspidated upper fangs of a huge openmouthed creature.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Steep Cliff
node.description: Above an icy ledge is a slippery slope peppered with jagged notches. Occasional branches and sticks, protruding from the sides of the steep cliff, offer additional handholds to tempt those who dare climb it.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Cliff Ledge
node.description: A small ledge offers minimal protection to the slippery slope beneath it. Chunks of rock and stone are covered with hoarfrost, their sharp jagged surfaces hiding deceivingly under the white icy blanket.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Cliff Ledge
node.description: Nature's hand has carved out a steep escarpment that leads upwards. Wind-filled tempests and natural elements have eroded and shaped it lovingly -- a harsh testament to the power they wield.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Widow's Respite
node.description: Stunted evergreens with oddly shaped limbs guard a steep escarpment like hunchbacked Dwarven sentries protecting a forbidden pathway. The deformed limbs are covered with withered, bent needles that are frozen solid, snapping easily with the slightest touch.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Widow's Respite
node.description: Huge boulders, glazed with thick crusts of white frost, butt up against the cliffside like broken snowmen left by a child's play. Other small rocks and pebbles litter the ground, runoff from the steep cliffs towering above.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Widow's Respite
node.description: The cold bitter winds are turbulent, echoing loudly throughout the area with a ghostly lament. Occasional gusts are filled with icy particles and tiny sharp stone fragments that tear at clothes and exposed skin.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Widow's Respite
node.description: Dozens of deep tracks left by unidentifiable animals in the now-frozen ground are filled with ice and rubble, making the terrain rugged and treacherous. Frost-covered rock slivers and chipped stone shards abundantly litter the area, covering some of the deep depressions.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Widow's Respite
node.description: A deep firepit has been hacked into the frozen earth. It is protected from the howling mountain winds by a circlet of small craggy rocks. Grouped close to the firepit are huge tree trunks that have been cut in half lengthwise to provide crude, uncomfortable benches.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Widow's Respite
node.description: A recent rockslide covered in ice and snow provides a formidable barrier to the northeast. Splintered rocks and stones, runoff from the towering mountain looming above, cover the ground.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Widow's Claw
node.description: Huge boulders and large rocks slick with ice send smaller stones and jagged rubble tumbling down a rockslide to the southwest. Ferocious winds surge through cracks and crannies, emitting a perpetual howl that echoes eerily off the cliffside.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Shallow Cave
node.description: Shrouded in frost and ice, the bones of some creature gleam pale against the dark stone. There is no sign of what brought death to this desolate place, but the splintered remains indicate that it was no peaceful ending. Fresh air enters the cave from a vertical crack, carrying with it a crisp chill that fogs the breath. Incongruous in this natural setting, a carved granite door at the back of the cave leads into the unknown depths of the mountain.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Sheer Ascent
node.description: Looming upwards as far as the eye can see is Asketi's Mountain, its icy top hidden by vaporous white clouds. The mountain walls, made even more difficult with ice and snow, seemingly dare climbers to attempt an ascent.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Cliff Face
node.description: Shrieking winds hurtle ice and snow, seeking to hammer all living things into oblivion or freeze them where they stand. Finding a safe way up the mountainside becomes increasingly difficult, as the granite is slick with ice. Scarred with deep gouges left by sharp climbing implements, a steep cliff offers a way downwards.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Broad Ledge
node.description: A broad ledge offers a brief respite from climbing, with minimal protection from the elements. The wind howls continuously, hammering against the sleek rock and whistling despondently as it funnels its way down the steep mountainside.

node.name: Hag's Crag, Broad Ledge
node.description: Encrusted with ice and snow, a sheer granite cliff towers above. Heavy with moisture, vaporous clouds encircle the area like ghostly fogbanks upon a churning sea, hindering movement and making travel hazardous.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Treacherous Cliff
node.description: Dense clouds obscure the view below, while an incredibly steep cliff soars out of sight into the icy mists overhead. At eye level are slippery mountain walls, marred with craggy holes left by pitons and gouges left by ice axes. Whistling winds rush down from the summit, trailing plumes of frost crystals that threaten to freeze the breath in one's lungs.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Plunging downwards in a near-vertical drop, a sheer granite cliff forms the southern face of the mountain's summit. Thin, wispy clouds writhe about the summit, sometimes taking the form of ground-hugging fog and other times swirling through the wild currents of wind like ghoulish apparitions.

Plunging downwards in a near-vertical drop, a sheer granite cliff forms the southern face of the mountain's summit. To the north, like a spear thrust into the heart of a large beast, the mountain reaches higher and higher to pierce the very heavens. Serpentine columns sculpted into the hard rock spiral about a massive structure carved into the solid rock of the mountaintop.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Temple of the North Wind
node.note: Temple of the North Wind|North Wind
node.description: Asketi's immaculate Temple of the North Wind towers above the flat summit, further dwarfing everything in the surrounding countryside. Carved directly from the granite mountain, the strength and security of the structure is unquestionable. Small ice crystals carried on the wind's updraft have coalesced to form a thin layer of frost on the temple's surface. Twisted shadows race across the granite arch entrance, but in the absence of light, it's hard to discern whether the shadows are real or imagined.

Asketi's immaculate Temple of the North Wind towers above the flat summit, further dwarfing everything in the surrounding countryside. Carved directly from the granite mountain itself, the strength and security of the structure is unquestionable. Small flecks of mica scattered throughout the structure glint softly in the day's light. Great black spires, reminiscent of twining adders, twist and wrap about one another as they climb ever higher, casting foreboding shadows upon the temple's entrance arch.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Frozen shards of stone and ice form a fine, loose rubble over the ground. Asketi's frozen North Wind shrieks out from around the temple and plummets over the edge of the lifeless mountaintop. For those brave enough to look, a vast view of the surrounding lands stretches out as far as the eye can see. Dark shadows blanket the forests below. The bowing of the trees to the force of the winds gives the illusion of shadowy phantasms sweeping over the countryside.

Frozen shards of stone and ice form a fine, loose rubble over the ground. Asketi's frozen North Wind shrieks out from around the temple and plummets over the edge of the lifeless mountaintop. For those brave enough to look, a vast, uninterrupted view of the surrounding forests stretches out as far as the eye can see. Grey, withered trees stand sentry near the base of the mountain while those still bearing signs of health stretch skyward further away.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: The darkened temple towers over the barren landscape, yet still the bone-chilling winds shriek wildly all about as if the temple were no deterrent at all to their ferocity. Loose rubble shifts dangerously loudly with each step taken. Jagged pillars of ice have been eternally frozen in a desperate grasp toward the heavens above.

Even the looming temple is not enough of a barrier to stifle the bone-chilling winds that claim dominance in this barren, frozen place. Great pillars of jagged, ageless ice reach skyward as if they were massive hands seeking affirmation of life beyond the temple's great shadows.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Broad Steps
node.description: Chiseled from the mountain's bedrock, broad steps faced with marble tile ascend through several feet of solid black granite. Polished to a soft gleam and carved to resemble undulating adders, ornate silverwillow banisters flow up the walls from the entry arch to the temple above.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Rows of tall pillars stretch off in either direction, forming a colonnade around the perimeter of the temple's lowest tier. Standing at the top of a flight of broad steps, a silent figure of cold stone scrutinizes all who ascend.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Scandalous by conservative standards, a frieze honoring Kerenhappuch and Idon covers much of the black granite wall. Icicles reach down the grooves of the fluted pillars, spilling onto the floor and trickling over the edge where the floor ends abruptly. A pair of marble gargoyles peer over the ledge, as if keeping watch for any foolish enough to attempt scaling the temple wall.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Nothing but wide-set pillars stands between the open air and the dubious safety of the windswept gallery. The ledge beyond the columns drops away sheer, plunging into the mists shrouding the base of the temple. Freezing gusts of wind quickly numb any exposed skin. Black granite soars overhead, carved with a frieze of malicious gremlins.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Turning sharply here, the broad ledge of the lower tier is lined with columns sculpted to resemble coiled adders. The stone serpents overlook the mists rising from the glacial fields below. A broad staircase has been chiseled into the heavy rock, ascending to the temple's second tier. Carvings cover the walls on either side of the stairs.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Dark Sanctuary
node.description: This expanse of ground is perfectly flat, as if the mountain's topmost peak had been sliced away. Rising up out of the snow is a mammoth stone edifice that spans almost the entire length and breadth of the summit. Glittering with touches of frost, giant columns of black marble support the roof and leave the temple open to the winds. To the east, a broad staircase cut into the rock leads down.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Dark Sanctuary
node.description: Gargantuan pillars of hewn stone support a vast roof high overhead. Bluish light emanates from glowing crystals set in iron sconces affixed to the mighty columns. Polished smooth as glass, the glossy floor of silver-veined black marble reflects the glow back in pools and arcs that slither across the stone like living things.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, High Altar
node.description: Open to the elements on all sides, the chamber's only shelter is offered by a roof of stone supported by four pillars. The seamless flow of granite from the floor to the ceiling bears silent witness that the temple had been hollowed out of the mountain's summit in some long-ago age. Numerous bones are suspended from the ceiling by slender ropes of steelsilk. An unadorned altar of ice-blue marble stands in the center of the room, a stark splash of color against the setting of black stone and ivory bone.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Dark Sanctuary
node.description: Gargantuan pillars of hewn stone support a vast roof high overhead. Bluish light emanates from glowing crystals set in iron sconces affixed to the mighty columns. Polished smooth as glass, the glossy floor of silver-veined black marble reflects the glow back in pools and arcs that slither across the stone like living things.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Dark Sanctuary
node.description: Gargantuan pillars of hewn stone support a vast roof high overhead. Bluish light emanates from glowing crystals set in iron sconces affixed to the mighty columns. Polished smooth as glass, the glossy floor of silver-veined black marble reflects the glow back in pools and arcs that slither across the stone like living things.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Dark Sanctuary
node.description: This expanse of ground is perfectly flat, as if the mountain's topmost peak had been sliced away. Rising up out of the snow is a mammoth stone edifice that spans almost the entire length and breadth of the summit. Glittering with touches of frost, giant columns of black marble support the roof and leave the temple open to the winds. To the west, a narrow staircase cut into the rock leads down.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Dark Sanctuary
node.description: Gargantuan pillars of hewn stone support a vast roof high overhead. Bluish light emanates from glowing crystals set in iron sconces affixed to the mighty columns. Polished smooth as glass, the glossy floor of silver-veined black marble reflects the glow back in pools and arcs that slither across the stone like living things.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Giant adders of black granite form the pillars along this stretch of the gallery. The floor ends just beyond the western side of the columns, dropping a dizzying height to the peak below. Life-sized statues are displayed on low pedestals situated between the pillars. Stretching high overhead, a large frieze depicting Dergati graces the eastern wall.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Built to honor Asketi, Mistress of the North Wind, the lower tier of the temple is open to the air. Scoured clean by the relentless wind, twisted monoliths rise dramatically from the outer ledge of the floor. Only the bulk of the temple's second level provides a modicum of shelter from the icy blasts of air shrieking across the mountain's peak. A meticulously carved frieze spans the foundation wall of the upper story.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: The drop beyond the soaring columns is sheer, a vertical buttress cleaving vacant air. A cold wind whistles around the spires, plucking at hair and clothing like malevolent imps. Carved into solid granite, a narrow stairway ascends to the temple's second level. A large sculpture in the middle of the gallery commands attention.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Carved in bas-relief, a frieze detailing elaborate scenes of agony and torture covers the wall. Arctic winds howl around the slim spires thrusting into the sky like spears of stone. Stinging particles of ice carried by the wind find their way into clothing and armor to produce a bone-deep chill.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Featureless stone columns, each polished so perfectly smooth that their curves gleam like a dull mirror, line the broad ledge that makes up the temple's bottom tier. Speckled with frost, the wall is covered with a frieze carved in high relief.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Last Sacrifice
node.description: Facing directly north, this corner of the temple has neither columns nor statuary to offer shelter from the deadly cold winds. Close to the ledge stands an angled slab of granite. Thick frost coats the iron manacles set into the slab, although the dark stone itself is free of rime.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Soaring spires form a wall of sorts along the brink of the precipice. Like vigilant sentinels, misshapen marble beasts sculpted in wary attitudes crouch between the columns. One statue, carved in the likeness of a winged orc, regards the frieze opposite him with a supercilious smile.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Colonnade
node.description: Intricately carved friezes depict natural disasters and the aftermath of devastation. Bitterly cold wind swirls between the granite pillars, exceptionally strong gusts rattling the slender spires as if to underscore the tale of destruction told by the graven images.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: The only evidence of a seasonal melt of the snow and ice is a worn crevice in the rock that slants ever more steeply towards the blighted lands around Asketi's mountain.
