Little more than a trickle ever makes its journey downwards at any given time, though the years of the slow moving liquids have gradually eroded the ground to form the crevice.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Countless decades of fierce winds have worn the ground completely smooth. The light rubble that dots a few small patches of the ice's surface is only discernable from the mixed snow and ice in some areas by its light discoloration under the surface.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Unlike the rubble-riddled ground near the temple, the mountain's surface becomes smooth and relatively free of debris save for dark swirls that wind their way through the frozen snow and ice towards the southern edge. The surrounding ice is lessened by the swirls, sapped of its luster and purity. Two boulders lean against one another near the massive granite structure, a narrow crevice remaining between the boulders and the ground beneath them.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: The crippling blight that plagues the region emanates outward from the majestic Temple of the North Wind. For as far as the eye can see towards the southwest the typically vibrant colors of the trees and other native foliage are dulled throughout the year. In place of spring greens and autumn reds and oranges are muted olives and browns. Even the white of snow-capped trees lower on the mountain is dingy and impure.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Some rocks have obviously been moved from their natural resting places into an arrow-like formation. A rough, uneven mound of snow provides an incline for the southward-pointing arrow to rest upon. Throughout most of the year the object being pointed to remains a mystery. However, those lucky enough to catch the first light of dawn through the spring and summer will find the arrow pointing to the Adder constellation low on the southern horizon.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: When not blanketed with clouds, the sky remains a brilliant whitish blue throughout all but the final moments of the day. In these uncharacteristically beautiful moments, deep purples and blues intermix with vibrant and fiery reds and oranges upon the sky's vast canvas. A stone bench, which is new compared to the temple itself, rests midway between the temple and the summit's edge for those desiring to gaze upon the sight.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: The looming temple partly shadows the surface during the morning hours of the day. Even when the sun gazes down fully upon Elanthia from its throne at midday, shadows manage to creep westward from some of the more prominent spires of the temple. As day descends into night, though, the shadows hastily retreat into the mica-flecked granite of the mighty fortress, patiently waiting for the time to creep out into the world again.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: A haunting yet melodic whisper is carried on the wind as it gusts through the trees of the forests below. In the brief reprieves from the vigorous gales, a thin, lingering fog wavers in and out of view just inches above the ice and rubble-covered ground.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: A small twig has been forcefully shoved into a rounded mound of ice. A tiny, faded ribbon that desperately clings to the twig holds a broken medallion fluttering in the moaning winds. Etched upon the half of the medallion that remains is the broad head of what once would have been an impressive unicorn. A single ice crystal has frozen just under the unicorn's eye, as if it were a tear of sadness from the avatar's goddess.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: A miniature shrine, if it could even be called that, rests dangerously close to the summit's edge. Sheltered inside the shrine is a diminutive representation of a withered, grey hag bearing a rough burlap sack at her hip and a blood-stained scythe in her right hand that is poised for a strike above her head. Propped at the base of the figure is a badly weathered crib filled with rotten vegetables that have been preserved only by the sheer lack of warmth to be found here atop the world.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: The winding path continues to meander its way around the impressive temple. The frigid temperatures bite to the very core of one's being, sapping the will to continue. A light fog lingers in this slightly lower area of the mountain's summit, creeping eerily over the ground without direction like a ghostly apparition.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Gate of Souls
node.description: Three blackened granite spires rise up out of the ground to form a stunning gateway leading into the gaping maw of a large cave. The fog that so heavily dominates this side of the mountain's summit recoils from the frigid blasts of air that emanate from within as if they were the expelled breath of Asketi herself.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: A delicate fog hugs the ground with its ethereal tendrils, winding its way in and out of the larger rocks that dot the summit's surface. Errant wisps of the grey substance occasionally spiral upward several feet above the ground. The hiss of the winds as they blast through tiny holes in the rocks lends the illusion of great, hulking adders keeping a watchful gaze over the area.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: The scattered debris of a fire lies near a grouping of three large boulders. The tips of only a few branches show any signs of ever being touched by a flame's life-giving warmth. Half-buried in a mound of snow and ice is a dulled sphere with a very faint yellow tinge to it, similar to that of a fading favor orb.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Drawn-out shadows stretch wildly across the northern face of the granite structure and leap completely over the mountain's cliff-like ledge. No fewer than six black marble gargoyles are in sight down the northern face of the temple, each displaying vengeful glowers as they peer out hauntingly in the dim light of night.

The temple's northern face looms above a series of massive statues. Each statue is a black marble gargoyle captured in some moment of ferocity. Expressions of rage, lust for battle, and savagery are spread across their faces. Great taloned claws rake menacingly at the air while several of the statues sport widely spread wings. The stalwart defenders have stood as guards for countless ages and show no signs of leaving their posts.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Entombed within an area of the ice unmarred by the rocky debris are the remnants of some long-forgotten plant. Perhaps in a much earlier time such plants were more prevalent here at the top of the world, or perhaps the pitiful thing is all that remains of someone's attempt to deny the brutal savagery of the unforgiving climate.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Deep, rolling masses of spectral fog creep in and continue on over the mountain's edge. Though the writhing mass is dense, the fog only comes up knee-high on a Human. Still, each step is dangerous enough to be tested lest some poor soul join the fog in its flight over the mountain's ledge!

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Wraithlike wisps of thick fog blanket the side of the mountain and roll listlessly over the summit's edge. As if the tendrils of fog weren't ominous enough, as each moon rises and shines its light upon the area, the fog fully takes on the lunar body's haunting glow.

Wraithlike wisps of thick fog blanket the side of the mountain and roll listlessly over the summit's edge. Rather than dissipating into the swift currents of the mountain's winds, the wisps roll out to form a shroud around the face of the mountain against the day's morning sun. Only during the peak of the sun's journey towards night is the veil pierced and the area illuminated.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Twin statues stand guard here, each gazing out upon the tainted lands surrounding the mountain. Both statues have been carved from very fine obsidian, obviously not native to the mountaintop, and both resemble Asketi's black unicorns. While one peers northeasterly towards the wholesome lands of Therengia far off in the distance, the other scrutinizes the lands of Zoluren and even Ilithi to the southeast. A cool, gentle fog writhes about the two figures.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: The winds screech angrily about as a corner of the temple deflects their hurried course. The dark granite structure has been worn smooth with the passage of both wind and time alike. Rather than snowdrifts filling the wind-guarded niche, an angled mound of solid ice studded with bits of stone climbs the temple's surface.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: A small scrap of cloth has been half-frozen into the disheveled rubble and ice mixture. The wild winds have blown the scrap into little more than tattered shreds of the garment to which it used to belong. A single red stripe on the cloth's underside remains untouched by the harsh climate, seemingly a testament to hope not being entirely forsaken in these troubled lands.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: A serpentine column of ice twists and winds its way across the ground before arching up into the air. A frozen, dark substance runs the length of the ice, contained almost precisely within the center of the structure. An enigma in both form and purpose, the frozen mass is remarkably free of the gravelly debris present even on the very ground that supports the column.

node.name: Asketi's Mount, Summit
node.description: Unnaturally long shadows flit about the darkened area, though where the shadows' owners may be can only be left to speculation. A solid sheet of ice blankets the ground here, freezing the rubble firmly into place. The ice is mostly smooth and unmarred except where broken shards of rubble rest.

Most of the ground is solid ice, as if a small stream of water had somehow erupted from the depths of the mountain and fallen prey to the wicked winds. The rubble here has been frozen firmly into place and makes little noise beneath the moving feet of those who dare travel the region.

node.name: Dirge's Solace, Garden of Souls
node.description: Light creeps in from the enormous gash that leads into the cavern, illuminating the chill vapors clinging to the floor with a diffuse glow. Dripping from the ceiling like the stalactites of more conventional caves, massive icicles catch and reflect the light in a sparkling display. The tinkling of cracking ice provides a staccato counterpoint to the moaning of the wind whipping through the entry.

node.name: Dirge's Solace, Garden of Souls
node.description: Blue icicles cascade down the walls onto the white drifts of frost covering the floor. Carved from grey ice, a banshee clad in a tattered funereal shroud stands with her head thrown back in a soundless wail while snow adders writhe about her feet. The tinkling of shattering ice is accompanied by the eerie fluting of the winds directed by holes drilled into the cavern walls. A carved granite door is set in one cavern wall, leading deeper into the mountain.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Recessed into an arched alcove is a granite door embedded with a softly glowing crystal. The lintel of the arch is skillfully carved with a fancifully rendered sunburst, although a thick layer of frost makes it difficult to ascertain the details. Even the suggestion of warmth from a graven image is ruthlessly smothered by the icy cold.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: The tunnel walls are rough but the solid rock floor is slick and almost glistening. The glossy layer of ice makes footing on the steep slope even more uncertain. Further down the tunnel, the black granite walls become smoother, as if polished.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Bas-relief carvings form knots of ornamentation on the granite walls. Each knot is composed of writhing adders entwined in a tangle, their crystal eyes gleaming with a cold, blue light. Despite the deadly cold, the air still carries a faint smell as of an open grave.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: A thin layer of hoarfrost coats everything, and breath steams in the frigid air. The tunnel runs fairly straight in either direction, as far as the eye can see, though it varies greatly in elevation. From all around comes a chill breeze, carrying an icy vapor that clings to flesh and stone alike.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Mined untold ages ago and bearing all the hallmarks of deliberate architectural planning, the tunnel curves sinuously around a bend. The walls are smooth and lightly decorated with the lacy skeins of ice spinning across the granite like the elaborate webs of some bizarre, elemental spider.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Slick from the cold damp air, passage through the narrowing tunnel is treacherous and daunting. A thin layer of ice covering the ground shows curiously wavy scuffs, as though some large, shapeless mass dwells within these claustrophobic depths of ice and stone.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Hewn from the granite mountain, the polished ceiling soars high overhead. Lightly coated with frost, an immense inscription spans the northern wall. The letters are as tall as a man, in archaic script. Several tunnels exit the cavern in many directions, a labyrinthine maze of passages.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Shaped by man and nature, this domed chamber has been hollowed out of the mountain and the walls burnished smooth as marble. On one side of the room, a stone staircase curves up to a circular aperture leading into darkness. Carrying wisps of chill vapor, a vague current of air swirls down the stairwell.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: The walls are carved with the semblance of suspended shields. Water seeps in a maze of rivulets down the cold stone, freezing into crystalline traceries accentuating the chiseled decorations. The frigid air is thick with a stale taste, making breathing labored and painful.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Dead End
node.description: A surging sea of icy vapor fills this circular chamber, long tendrils of mist swirling upwards as if seeking an exit. Ice shimmers blue and white against the black granite, tracing the curving pillars sculpted from the walls to support the concave ceiling. The deep gouges marring the pillars are jarring notes in this place of stark and cold beauty.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Chiseled floor to ceiling, an artistic splendor of spiral lines illustrates adders slithering through garlands of withered grapevines. Underfoot, the slick ice covering the floor demands careful movement. Anyone who fell and broke something could lie unaided for a long time, at the mercy of the elements and whatever creatures may prowl these subterranean tunnels.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Gleaming particles of ice coat the tunnel, sparkling like faceted gems. The frosty display catches and magnifies even feeble light until the area is bathed a soft azure glow. Crystalline snowflakes drift down from the ceiling, adding an impression of movement to the prismatic play of light.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Dead End
node.description: Terminating in a blank wall, this cul-de-sac is small and cramped with thick layers ice obscuring even a hint of the mountain's black granite. Revealed by the play of light are dim shapes caught within the translucent blue ice covering the walls, the floor and even the ceiling.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Dark Shaft
node.description: Flickering light from the opening above is diffused by swirling vapors, faintly illuminating the great black shaft plunging deep into the earth. Huge stones have been set into the curving walls as steps, circling down and down into the bowels of the mountain.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Wisps of mist rise up to the coffered ceiling of carved granite, riding gusts of frigid air rising from the yawning pit in the center of the floor. Flickering lamps placed in shallow recesses provide scant illumination, giving life to the shifting shadows as the light reflects off the swirling vapors and ice-slicked walls. A moaning whisper soars to a cacophonous scream as the cold wind rushes up from the depths, only to fade again to a nearly inaudible murmur.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Upright sarcophagi line the walls, blanketed with a final burial shroud of frost and soot. The omnipresent rime of ice bears silent witness to the sheer number of years the caskets have resided here. Wind whistles through a rusting portcullis, as if playing a quiet dirge for the dead.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Cold seeps from the floor and walls with an amazing capacity to chill to the bone in this desolate combination of stone and lethal ice. Tunnels branch off in several directions and elevations, leading deeper into the bowels of the mountain. Icy breaths of wind whisper through the passageways, disturbing crystals of frost and sending them swirling through the air in a gentle mockery of falling snow.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Clouds of misty vapor and ice particles cling to the floor, further complicating traversing the slick stone. Rising out of the whirling mists are granite walls sculptured with thick, spiraling bands. Indistinct hissing echoes softly, a sibilant murmur carried by the chill breeze whispering through the tunnel.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: The omnipresent ice is much thicker in this portion of the tunnel, deep enough to envelop two frost-encrusted skeletons half-embedded the walls. One boney arm protrudes from the frosty depths to point almost accusingly at the ceiling, where icicles of every size and length hang in dense, glittering clusters.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Dead End
node.description: Despite the chill that oozes from the walls, a serene tranquility enfolds the cul-de-sac and lends the area an almost reverent quality. A layer of ice sets the black stone aglitter with reflected light, as if the tunnel were coated in brittle glass. After the winds whispering constantly through the upper tunnels, sounds that should echo loudly are unnaturally hushed as if muffled by the heavy air.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Frost coats everything with layer after layer of a fine film of ice. The twisting confines of the frozen tunnel alarmingly amplify insignificant sounds, broadcasting to anyone within earshot. Nearly effaced murals are impossible to decipher, reduced to faint suggestions of sinuous curves and lines scrolling across the walls.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Turning sharply, the tunnel blocks a clear view in either direction. Trickling water has frozen in ripples down the curving black granite walls, sheathing the stone in a natural mirror of ice. The outrageously distorted reflections are distracting at best, the hints of movement and unfamiliar shapes playing up fear of the unknown.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Slick as glass, the steeply sloping tunnel is treacherous and unwelcoming. Rimed with a sparkling veil of frost, the granite walls magnify and reflect light into a shimmering dance of icy brilliance. Whispers of marginally warmer air swirl through the frigid passage, releasing wisps of mist. Re-freezing swiftly, the frozen particles float until adhering to the stone like fat snowflakes, giving the black granite a lacy appearance.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Imposing walls of stone sheathed in ice leech the very warmth from the air. Sounds are muffled by the thick blanket of frost covering the floor and echoes die quickly in the close confines of the tunnel. Sculpted from the mountain, frost-coated pillars glitter in the pale blue light shed by a glowing crystal embedded in the carved granite door.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Glossy with ice, the floor exudes a pressing cold that instantly penetrates clothing and goes bone deep. Traces of banded carvings decorate the dark granite walls. Rising at a steep grade, the floor has been shallowly scored to provide traction. Most of the grooves have been worn smooth, either by the wind channeled through the tunnels or by the passage of others.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Twisting around a sharp turn, the tunnel disappears into the darkness. Frequent blasts of icy wind course through the area, their origins unknown. Footing is treacherous on the icy floor, demanding careful movement. A slight misstep could easily end in a sudden fall onto the hard, unforgiving stone.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Resonating from the dark depths comes the sound of howling wind, perhaps the result of a passage leading out of the mountain. The curving walls of this portion of the tunnel were sculpted from the surrounding stone. Several monstrous serpents, their broad heads turned to the floor, appear to be emerging from the icy granite.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Barren walls radiate cold that bounces off the frosty tunnel floor. The icy path reflects countless shades of white rippled with the dark shadows of stone. Small ice chips crunch loudly underfoot with each stride over the treacherously slick surface.

node.name: Adder's Nest, Frozen Tunnels
node.description: Corbelled stone supports the tunnel's vaulted ceiling, straining against the pull of gravity attempting to collapse the passage beneath the weight of the mountain. A thin layer of ice covers the path, making the floor slick and treacherous. Sculpted from the walls, a pair of frost-coated pillars glitter in the pale light shed by a glowing crystal embedded in the carved granite door.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Constructed from ice-fused humanoid bones, an immense adder coils about the perimeter of the room. Hanging from a chain, a skull serves as a grisly lantern with weak light emanating through its vacant eye sockets. Beneath the macabre chandelier, a trio of sarcophagi rests upon a low dais. An inconstant breeze whispers through the alcove, chilling the air even colder here than in the outer room.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Dense frost covers every surface in this section of the catacombs, save for one place on the floor close to a large jumble of bones. An irregular patch of black granite shows starkly amidst the filmy white glaze. Sibilant whispers echo through the tunnel, a multitude of muted voices wailing in mournful discord.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Thousands of bones arrayed in decorative patterns conceal the walls of the tomb. Framed by curving ribs, an arched alcove serves as the final resting place for a skeletal figure clad in hooded black robes. At the foot of the skeleton, a trio of skulls stare balefully at the opening leading back to the catacombs.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Lit by small lamps placed within recesses carved from the walls, the narrow corridor stretches between the tombs. Wavering shadows emphasize the hollow eye sockets of the articulated skeletons affixed to the wall and give a sense of subtle movement when glimpsed peripherally.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Jaw bones and femurs form skeletal arrows radiating out from an alcove hewn from the back wall. Stacks of bones line the other two walls, capped by rows of skulls angled to gaze eternally upon the sarcophagus resting within the niche.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Gleaming like faint stars on the dank floor, a translucent layer of frost spreads across the stone and up along the walls. Rectangular slabs of ivory marble seal the tombs carved out of the mountain granite. Strung together to form macabre ribbons, ribs and arm bones cover the spaces between the individual graves.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Centuries of burial have filled every nook and cranny of the ossuary with the grim relics of the dead. One wall is decorated with curving rows of vertebrae forming stylized waves broken here and there by yellowing scapulae, grotesquely reminiscent of dorsal fins clearing the ocean's surface.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Faint streaks of golden lamplight play over granite walls obscured by sheer curtains of frost and shadow. Burial niches contain an overflowing abundance of bones sheathed in ice. Skulls, femurs, finger-bones and vertebrae litter the floor and make for treacherous footing. Through some acoustic trick, the curvature of the rough-hewn steps magnifies even the slightest of sounds, generating echoes that reverberate eerily through the stone tunnels.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Skeletal fingers of ice reach down from the ceiling, dripping spatters of water onto the intricate mosaic covering the floor. Wisps of smoke drift from beeswax candles, scenting the air with a hint of honey at odds with the eternal cold of stone and ice enfolding the catacombs. Rough-hewn steps spiral down into darkness.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Twisting and turning, the claustrophobic burial hallway is filled with grim reminders of its purpose. Bones spill from niches crammed full of fleshless remains. Stacks of femurs placed against the wall are mortared with ice. Silence weighs heavy in the frigid air as if intent on smothering all signs of life that dare intrude in this place of the dead.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Countless skeletons have been crammed tightly into the narrow niches lining the walls. More bones lie along the walls, methodically sorted by size and type into geometrical designs that rise halfway to the ceiling. A row of vacant-eyed skulls sits atop the macabre wainscotting. Frost coats everything with a dusting of glittering white.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Like a garland of death, a swag of skulls is draped over a simple arch framed by ribs stacked to form tapering columns. The deep recesses of the ossuary are filled with yellowing bones. Flickering light emanates from an oil lamp placed upon a skeletal pyramid, lending a golden sheen to the frost-covered remains. Chill silence spreads over the crypt like a pall.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Panes of ice sheathe the stone walls from floor to ceiling, sealing most of the niches rising tier above tier. Jagged edges frame one long recess half-filled with stacks of bones sorted by size. A grinning skull peeks out from a fan of curved ribs, strangely reminiscent of a coy young woman's flirtations.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Broken here and there by shallow horizontal alcoves, the catacomb walls are sheathed in curtains of glistening ice. A jumble of bones fills each niche completely. Formed by slow seeping moisture, which freezes over time, new sheets of ice will eventually form a final burial shroud for the remains.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Scores of corpses have been haphazardly crammed into the deep recesses lining the walls. Ice fills most of the niches, spilling out of the openings in glistening waves of dirty white. The tunnel terminates at a wall, coated lightly with frost and carved with a bas-relief depicting Asketi astride a snorting unicorn.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Delicate frost spreads across the walls like an opalescent veil, drifting down to cover the fleshless remains of the dead interred within the niches. Tall candelabra are spaced along the length of the corridor. Some thoughtful soul has lit a few of the tapers, although shadows still cling like cobwebs in the corners.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Broken here and there by shallow horizontal alcoves, the catacomb walls are sheathed in curtains of glistening ice. A jumble of bones fills each niche completely. Formed by slow seeping moisture, which freezes over time, new sheets of ice will eventually form a final burial shroud for the remains.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Numerous alcoves filled with remains of souls long deceased line the walls. Dark shadows behind curtains of ice descending from the ceiling indicate more bones are sealed within frozen stone. Frozen pools fill the depressions in the uneven floor.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: The warren of close-set corridors snakes deeper into the mountain. Slender icicles stream from the soot-blackened ceiling, rippling gold in the candlelight. The floors lit by the flickering glow are smooth stone starred with frost.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: A narrow winding staircase has been chiseled into the heavy rock. Twisting around a corner, it spirals up into darkness. Utilizing all available space for burial, bone-filled niches line the walls of the stairwell. A thin layer of frost covers the rough granite floor.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Winding serpentinely back and forth, frost-covered stairs lure one deeper into the catacombs. Stale air wafts up from the subterranean passages below, carrying with it a hint of ice and decay. The darkness of the tunnel is broken by a single lantern, which casts wavering shadows over the bone-filled niches lining the walls.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Dripping water echoes eerily through these subterranean chambers. Shadowy niches, hollowed out of the mountain granite, line the walls from floor to ceiling. Bodies in various phases of decomposition fill the shallow alcoves. A thin layer of frost covers the stone and corpses indiscriminately, glittering in the dim light cast by earthenware lamps placed within small recesses carved from the walls.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Illumination from the passage beyond bathes the walls with a pearlescent gleam, glinting along the edges of the polished dove-grey marble tiles. Shallow gutters score each side of the chamber while a series of drainage holes are visible in the ceiling overhead. Placed within a semicircular recess carved in the wall is a pale stone casket.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Oppressive silence fills these subterranean chambers, broken only by the faint sound of dripping water. Untold numbers of corpses fill the sepulchral recesses lining the walls. Cold and barren, the catacombs are devoid of the sense of light and life present above ground even during a winter's night.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Large tiles of golden marble interlock with scarcely visible seams along the walls and floor. The scale of the stonework lends this alcove a sense of majesty requiring reverence. Shallow gutters score each side of the chamber floor, while a series of drainage holes are visible in the ceiling overhead. Placed within a semicircular recess carved in the wall, a pale stone casket gleams with a mantle of frost.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Faint yet steady, the persistent sound of dripping water echoes in the cold stone passages. Narrow recesses are carved from the walls, filled with the remains of the dead. Thin veils of ice cover the bodies with a final burial shroud. The air, chill and stale, seems to grow heavier with each passing moment.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Blue marble tiles, rectangles of ancient stone cut and placed with perfect symmetry, line the walls around and the ceiling above. Shallow gutters score each side of the chamber while a series of drainage holes are visible overhead. Placed within a semicircular recess carved in the wall, a pale stone casket gleams with a mantle of frost.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Dripping water echoes eerily through these subterranean chambers. Shadowy niches, hollowed out of the mountain granite, line the walls from floor to ceiling. Bodies in various phases of decomposition fill the shallow alcoves. A thin layer of frost covers the stone and corpses indiscriminately, glittering in the dim light cast by earthenware lamps placed within small recesses carved from the walls.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Devoid of the familiar sights and sounds of the lands above, these subterranean chambers are ominously quiet. Sepulchral recesses line the walls, chiseled into the mountain granite. Each are filled with corpses in varying stages of decay. Water drips slowly from the ceiling, covering the bodies in a thin veil of ice.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Solid granite has been hewn away to form this spacious antechamber. The dark walls are decorated with worn bas-reliefs, all covered with a layer of frost. An occasional draft of frigid air swirls down the staircase, accompanied by a faint moaning whisper. Lit candles flicker with shifts in the air current, causing the light pooling on the floor to dance frenetically before settling back into a steady glow.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Ornate pillars carved from the mountain itself frame vertical alcoves lining both sides of the passage. Skeletons are propped up within each, gazing sightlessly upon all who trespass within these halls of the dead. One alcove is empty but for a dark silhouette traced by frost against the stone, leaving no clue as to where the previous occupant now resides.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Snowy marble tiles line the walls, gleaming beneath an opalescent veil of ice. Shallow gutters score each side of the chamber while a series of drainage holes are visible in the ceiling overhead. Placed within a semicircular recess carved in the wall, a pale stone casket gleams with a mantle of frost.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished black granite flecked with silvery mica encloses this alcove in bleakest midnight and stars. A subtle draft of frigid air swirls through the chamber. Covered with a thick layer of frost, a low casket rests upon the floor.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Dense shadows creep in along every surface, disturbed by the flickering of faint illumination reflecting off the patches of ice covering the walls and floor. Shallow gutters score each side of the chamber while icicles clog most of the drainage holes in the ceiling overhead. A translucent curtain of ice seals a large, semi-circular recess.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Walls thickly coated with frost soar up to a vaulted ceiling. Coiled adders of polished copper are laid into the floor, forming a visual barrier before the entry. Centered in the chamber is a green marble catafalque, upon which rest fleshless remains wrapped in a rotting cerement. The faint scent of sweet spices and bitter incense lingers in the air, despite the nose-numbing cold.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: A broad circular staircase leads further down into the catacombs. Grey stone forms a low barrier around the edge of the pit ringed by the steps. Frayed hemp fibers are caught in the weathered iron rings embedded in the wall.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Deep recesses in the walls rise from floor to ceiling in this corner of the catacombs. Bodies wrapped in fine wool are interred within these stone shelves. Chill winds whistle through the shafts cut in the ceiling, skirling a wild lament for the dead.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: The passage here is chill and damp, smelling faintly of snow. Close to the ceiling, the glossy black walls are lightly starred with frost. Icy air blows intermittently through shafts cut into the roof, carrying the occasional snowflake. The cadences of these drafts hold a vague suggestion of a wild, almost musical piping.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished walls of black granite are lined with hollowed-out niches rising tier above tier, like berths in a ship, from floor to ceiling. Bodies wrapped in fine wool are interred within these horizontal recesses. Several are inaccessible from the floor, leaving one to wonder how they were chiseled out of the hard rock.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Hewn from the mountain itself, polished black granite walls shine with such a high gloss that reflections are seen with almost crystal clarity. Small shafts cut into the ceiling exhale frigid streams of air. A moaning dirge whispers through the tunnels, rising to a shriek then fading back to near inaudibility with no discernible rhythm or meaning.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished granite walls taper up to a curved triangular point from which a silvery globe is suspended. Beneath the globe is a narrow marble catafalque, upon which rest skeletal remains wrapped in a tattered winding-sheet. A chill enfolds the area within its icy grasp, mercifully choking off any stench of decay.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished granite walls taper up to a curved triangular point from which a silvery globe is suspended. Beneath the globe is a narrow marble catafalque, upon which rest skeletal remains wrapped in a tattered winding-sheet. A chill enfolds the area within its icy grasp, mercifully choking off any stench of decay.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Four colossal columns of polished black granite support a vaulted ceiling. Each is inscribed with prayers for the dead. Alabaster inlay highlights a representation of the constellation known as the Adder etched on the floor. The surrounding stone exudes an icy chill much like a brazier gives off heat.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished granite walls taper up to a curved triangular point from which a silvery globe is suspended. Beneath the globe is a narrow marble catafalque, upon which rest skeletal remains wrapped in a tattered winding-sheet. A chill enfolds the area within its icy grasp, mercifully choking off any stench of decay.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished walls of black granite are lined with hollowed-out niches rising tier above tier, like berths in a ship, from floor to ceiling. Bodies wrapped in fine wool are interred within these horizontal recesses. Several are inaccessible from the floor, leaving one to wonder how they were chiseled out of the hard rock.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Twin sarcophagi rest in the center of the chamber. A broad recess houses a bas-relief of two male Dwarves dressed in priestly robes. A strong resemblance between the pair suggests a family relationship. Veils of scented smoke drift up from a shallow bowl placed on the ledge beneath the carving.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Alive with statuary carved from the living earth itself, a great menagerie of animals stands watch over the tomb. Life-sized sculptures of arzumos and leucros, giant serpents and scorpions seem to move in the flickering shadows, their gaze fixed in stony silence upon a plain sarcophagus covered with a flat marble slab.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished granite walls taper up to a curved triangular point from which a silvery globe is suspended. Beneath the globe is a narrow marble catafalque, upon which rest skeletal remains wrapped in a tattered winding-sheet. A chill enfolds the area within its icy grasp, mercifully choking off any stench of decay.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Hewn from the mountain itself, polished black granite walls shine with such a high gloss that reflections are seen with almost crystal clarity. Small shafts cut into the ceiling exhale frigid streams of air. Faint whispers tease at the edge of hearing, distorted by the echoing length of the passage.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished granite walls taper up to a curved triangular point from which a silvery globe is suspended. Beneath the globe is a narrow marble catafalque, upon which rest skeletal remains wrapped in a tattered winding-sheet. A chill enfolds the area within its icy grasp, mercifully choking off any stench of decay.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished walls of black granite shine with a reflective gloss. Carved adders wrap an arch with stony coils, basking in the icy currents of air swirling through small holes cut in the ceiling. A moaning dirge whispers through the tunnels, rising to a shriek then fading back to near inaudibility with no discernible rhythm or meaning.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Polished granite walls taper up to a curved triangular point from which a silvery globe is suspended. Beneath the globe is a narrow marble catafalque, upon which rest skeletal remains wrapped in a tattered winding-sheet. A chill enfolds the area within its icy grasp, mercifully choking off any stench of decay.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Smooth, white plaster covers the wall space between pillars of blue-black granite. Overhead, the vaulted ceiling is painted to resemble a stormy sky. A tall statue of Asketi stands guard over a carved granite arch. Framed by a tangle of disheveled hair, the grim-faced goddess glares malevolently at all who approach. In her hands is a blued steel scythe, the honed edge glittering in the dim light.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Contrasting sharply with the white plastered walls, blue-black granite pillars support an arching ceiling painted a dark shade of crimson. Delineated by smoky crystal shards inlaid in the ceiling, a wild-eyed black unicorn is portrayed in mid-curvet, a vivid depiction of coiled violence preparing to unleash a devastating kick.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Pillars of blue-black granite line the white plastered walls, supporting an arching ceiling painted an exquisite shade of cerulean. Outlined by silvery stars embedded in the ceiling, a dark adder writhes against the blue background, its silver-gilt fangs exposed in mute threat.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Catacombs
node.description: Ascending into shadows above, a staircase follows the walls of the circular chamber. A low bier covered with black silk stands centered beneath the well formed by the spiraling stairs. Fitful light cast by lanterns flanking the arch to the north does little to alleviate the darkness closing all around.

node.name: Temple of the North Wind, Secret Staircase
node.description: Featureless black granite walls are polished perfectly so that their smooth curves gleam like a dull mirror. Four silver sconces set equidistant around the circular chamber provide excellent light. Shallow steps run along the walls, gradually spiraling downward in a great winding arc. In the center of the chamber a gaping pit descends into the bedrock. A silken net hangs from a system of ropes and pulleys affixed by the top of the steps.

node.name: Hunter's Glade, Liirewsag River
node.description: Saplings growing from slivers of earth caught in the crevices of the stony crags lining the river arc gently out over the water. Their shallow roots extend over the surface of the stone and dangle in the river, embrangling whatever debris or unlucky swimmer the current sweeps too close.

node.name: Hunter's Glade, Liirewsag River
node.description: The water laps against the steep crags to the east, tugging at the inaccessible bank like a child pulling on its mother's apron strings for attention. Greys and browns paint the layering of generations on the face of the rocky wall.

node.name: Hunter's Glade, Liirewsag River
node.description: Pulling and pushing insistently, the bone-chilling currents rush downstream in a frenzied waltz of swirling water. It appears always the same, yet changing constantly, and in the airless world beneath the surface, the river whispers its secret I shall never pass this way again and you will never swim in the same river twice.

node.name: Hawstkaal Road, Dense Forest
node.description: The reek of skunk cabbage wafts from a clump of thick leaves growing at the edge of a tiny creek that trickles from the north. From a distance, the smell isn't very strong, but when the leaves are bruised, crushed, or otherwise damaged, they release an intense odor that attracts insects and may cause eyes to water.

node.name: Hunter's Glade, Liirewsag River
node.description: Pulling and pushing insistently, the bone-chilling currents rush downstream in a frenzied waltz of swirling water. It appears always the same, yet changing constantly, and in the airless world beneath the surface, the river whispers its secret I shall never pass this way again and you will never swim in the same river twice.

node.description: Pulling and pushing insistently, the bone-chilling currents rush downstream in a frenzied waltz of swirling water. It appears always the same, yet changing constantly, and in the airless world beneath the surface, the river whispers its secret I shall never pass this way again and you will never swim in the same river twice.

node.description: Pulling and pushing insistently, the bone-chilling currents rush downstream in a frenzied waltz of swirling water. It appears always the same, yet changing constantly, and in the airless world beneath the surface, the river whispers its secret I shall never pass this way again and you will never swim in the same river twice.

It appears always the same, yet changing constantly, and in the airless world beneath the surface, the river whispers its secret I shall never pass this way again and you will never swim in the same river twice.
